business_definition: Group item containing standard IMS DL/I function codes and parameter count used for database operations
IMS DL/I Get Unique function code for retrieving a specific database segment (VALUE 'GU  ')
IMS DL/I Get Hold Unique function code for retrieving and locking a specific segment for update (VALUE 'GHU ')
IMS DL/I Get Next function code for sequential retrieval of database segments (VALUE 'GN  ')
IMS DL/I Get Hold Next function code for sequential retrieval with lock for update (VALUE 'GHN ')
IMS DL/I Get Next within Parent function code for retrieving next segment under same parent (VALUE 'GNP ')
IMS DL/I Get Hold Next within Parent function code for retrieving and locking next segment under same parent (VALUE 'GHNP')
IMS DL/I Replace function code for updating a previously retrieved segment (VALUE 'REPL')
IMS DL/I Insert function code for adding new segments to the database (VALUE 'ISRT')
IMS DL/I Delete function code for removing segments from the database (VALUE 'DLET')
Parameter count for IMS DL/I calls, typically indicating number of SSAs or parameters (VALUE +4) (USAGE COMP-5)
